20101210050429.333|20101210050431.000|CCO|IT HAS BEEN MORE THAN I

20101210050448.500|20101210050451.000|CCO|IT ONCE I GET OUT THERE.

20101210050454.333|20101210050456.000|CCO|100%.

20101210050618.500|20101210050619.750|CCO|>> ENOUGH. 
20101210050619.750|20101210050621.000|CCO|>> Reporter: NOW -- 
20101210050621.000|20101210050622.667|CCO|>> A NETWORK.
20101210050622.667|20101210050624.333|CCO|>> Reporter: WHY NOT TAKE A DEEP
20101210050624.333|20101210050626.000|CCO|BREATH?
20101210050626.000|20101210050627.667|CCO|YOU DON'T NEED THE MONEY.
20101210050627.667|20101210050629.333|CCO|>> IT'S NEVER BEEN ABOUT THE 
20101210050629.333|20101210050631.000|CCO|MONEY.
20101210050631.000|20101210050633.500|CCO|>> Reporter: OPRAH SAYS THE IDEA
20101210050633.500|20101210050636.000|CCO|FOR A NEW NETWORK GREW OUT OF A 
20101210050636.000|20101210050638.500|CCO|CONVERSATION ARE FROM HER LONG 
20101210050638.500|20101210050641.000|CCO|TIME PARTNER, STEDMAN GRAHAM. 
20101210050641.000|20101210050642.667|CCO|>> STEDMAN AND I WERE IN A HOTEL
20101210050642.667|20101210050644.333|CCO|WATCHING BAD TELEVISION AND I 
20101210050644.333|20101210050646.000|CCO|WAS COMPLAINING ABOUT THE STATE 
20101210050646.000|20101210050647.667|CCO|OF TELEVISION, TALK SHOWS IN 
20101210050647.667|20101210050649.333|CCO|PARTICULAR.
20101210050649.333|20101210050651.000|CCO|HE SAID WHY DON'T YOU CHANGE IT?
20101210050651.000|20101210050652.667|CCO|WHY DON'T YOU GET YOUR OWN 
20101210050652.667|20101210050654.333|CCO|NETWORK?
20101210050654.333|20101210050656.000|CCO|I THOUGHT IT WAS A RIDICULOUS 
20101210050656.000|20101210050657.667|CCO|IDEA.
20101210050657.667|20101210050659.333|CCO|HE STARTED TO TALK ABOUT IT AND 
20101210050659.333|20101210050701.000|CCO|WROTE SOME THINGS DOWN.
20101210050701.000|20101210050703.500|CCO|I SAW THE WORD O, O-W, THOSE ARE
20101210050703.500|20101210050706.000|CCO|MY INITIALS.
20101210050706.000|20101210050708.500|CCO|I SAID WOULDN'T IT BE SOMETHING 
20101210050708.500|20101210050711.000|CCO|IF I COULD CREATE A NETWORK THAT
20101210050711.000|20101210050713.500|CCO|WAS ABOUT MINDFUL, I UNDERLINED 
20101210050713.500|20101210050716.000|CCO|THE WORD MINDFUL, TELEVISION. 
20101210050716.000|20101210050718.500|CCO|>> Reporter: SHE WAS APPROACHED 
20101210050718.500|20101210050721.000|CCO|BY DAVID ZASLOFF.
20101210050721.000|20101210050723.000|CCO|>> MY IDEA WAS IF YOU WANT TO DO
20101210050723.000|20101210050725.000|CCO|THIS, YOU HAVE TO BE ALL THIS.
20101210050725.000|20101210050727.000|CCO|SHE PAUSED AND SAID IT'S MEANT 
20101210050727.000|20101210050729.000|CCO|TO BE.
20101210050729.000|20101210050731.000|CCO|WE SHOOK HANDS AND THAT'S HOW 
20101210050731.000|20101210050732.111|CCO|OUR JOURNEY BEGAN. 
20101210050732.111|20101210050733.222|CCO|>> AT FIRST I THOUGHT GREAT, A 
20101210050733.222|20101210050734.333|CCO|NETWORK.
20101210050734.333|20101210050735.444|CCO|THIS IS THE DREAM I HAD.
20101210050735.444|20101210050736.556|CCO|I ACTUALLY SHOWED HIM THE PIECE 
20101210050736.556|20101210050737.667|CCO|OF PAPER WHERE I HAD WRITTEN IT 
20101210050737.667|20101210050738.778|CCO|DOWN.
20101210050738.778|20101210050739.889|CCO|STEDMAN SAID IT.
20101210050739.889|20101210050741.000|CCO|AS THAT STARTED TO SETTLE IN 
20101210050741.000|20101210050744.333|CCO|WITH ME, I THOUGHT WHOA, WHAT IS
20101210050744.333|20101210050747.667|CCO|THIS I'VE GOTTEN MYSELF INTO?
20101210050747.667|20101210050751.000|CCO|THIS IS A LOT MORE WORK THAN I 
20101210050751.000|20101210050752.667|CCO|EVER IMAGINED.
20101210050752.667|20101210050754.333|CCO|>> Reporter: WERE YOU SCARED?
20101210050754.333|20101210050756.000|CCO|>> I WAS VERY SCARED.
20101210050756.000|20101210050757.667|CCO|I WOULD WAKE UP IN THE MIDDLE OF
20101210050757.667|20101210050759.333|CCO|THE NIGHT LITERALLY CLUTCHING MY
20101210050759.333|20101210050801.000|CCO|CHEST LIKE WHAT HAVE I DONE?
20101210050801.000|20101210050803.500|CCO|WHAT HAVE I DONE. 
20101210050803.500|20101210050806.000|CCO|>> Reporter: WHAT IF YOU FAIL?
20101210050806.000|20101210050808.500|CCO|>> THAT'S WHAT I WAS AFRAID OF.
20101210050808.500|20101210050811.000|CCO|THE REASON WHY I MADE THE 
20101210050811.000|20101210050813.500|CCO|DECISION TO GO FORWARD IS 
20101210050813.500|20101210050816.000|CCO|BECAUSE I BELIEVE THAT PEOPLE 
20101210050816.000|20101210050818.500|CCO|DESERVE TO HAVE VALUE CENTERED 
20101210050818.500|20101210050821.000|CCO|INSPIRATIONAL PROGRAMMING FOR 
20101210050821.000|20101210050826.000|CCO|THEMSELVES.
20101210050826.000|20101210050831.000|CCO|I BELIEVE THAT TELEVISION HAS 
20101210050831.000|20101210050833.500|CCO|BECOME, IN MANY WAYS, FINAL.
20101210050833.500|20101210050836.000|CCO|IT HAS BECOME INSIPID.
20101210050836.000|20101210050838.500|CCO|NOT ALL OF IT, BUT I THINK I 
20101210050838.500|20101210050841.000|CCO|HAVE SOMETHING TO OFFER. 
20101210050841.000|20101210050843.500|CCO|>> IT ALL BEGAN HERE.
20101210050843.500|20101210050846.000|CCO|THE NEW OPRAH WINFREY NETWORK.
20101210050846.000|20101210050848.500|CCO|>> Reporter: THE NEW CHANNEL 
20101210050848.500|20101210050851.000|CCO|OWNED WILL DEBUT WITH THE 
20101210050851.000|20101210050852.667|CCO|COMBINATION OF REALITY SHOWS, 
20101210050852.667|20101210050854.333|CCO|IN-DEPTH DOCUMENTARIES.
20101210050854.333|20101210050856.000|CCO|>> THIS IS THE MOMENT THAT HE 
20101210050856.000|20101210050857.667|CCO|HAS BEEN WAITING FOR FOR 15 
20101210050857.667|20101210050859.333|CCO|YEARS.
20101210050859.333|20101210050901.000|CCO|>> HERE WE GO.
20101210050901.000|20101210050902.429|CCO|>> Reporter: A SERIES THAT
